alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 11:39PM AKST until February 27 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SUNDAY TO 9 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and winds gusting as high as 45 mph will reduce visibility down to one half mile at times. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 9 AM Sunday to 9 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A slow moving front will approach Saint George Island Sunday morning then slowly lift north across Saint Paul Island by Monday morning. Snow will develop across the Pribilof Islands from south to north in advance of the front. Easterly winds of 20 to 35 mph gusting to 45 mph will accompany the snow, leading to significantly reduced visibilities as low to one half mile at times. Temperatures will climb above freezing in the wake of the front, allowing snow to transition to rain by early Monday morning for Saint George Island and around mid-morning Monday for Saint Paul Island.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
